answers.answer: If your doctor isn't concerned then you shouldn't worry. Can't really relate tho I'm almost 34 weeks and have gained 25 pounds. Started out at 140. I'm 5'8 so I think I'm still in the normal range. I Wish I was not gaining so much tho. Just more to lose at the end of pregnancy

I'm also 32 weeks. I started off at 168 and now I weigh 173. I have GD as well. The doctor keeps sending me to get ultrasounds bc I am measuring small but every time I go they say that everything looks fine.
I'm 32 weeks started at 136 and now 156, 5'2 I've carried my weight well the firat 7 months, but now no weight gain and feet r getting swollen :/

Im 35 weeks and have not picked up any weight...baby on other hand is measuring 2weeks ahead. Dr not worried as i had the same with my first pregnancy...as long as baby is growing steadily. I had SEVERE nausea in first trimester and flu 3 times in second trimester with both pregnancies which explains the weight

question: I'm 32 weeks and 125 lbs. I started the pregnancy at 123 lbs. Doctor sent me to get an ultrasound to mesure the baby to make sure she is fine. I also have gestational diabetes, should i be worried???
title: not gaining weight...
